chunks.text: With all the tea objects  You can also associate it with multiple values  But when you do it  You associate it with the value  But jango is not that intelligent

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: We want to force jango  I will talk about this in detail  In the next video  Now I know  How I have a field

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: Whether it is a model choice field  Or a character field  After that I have to take this form  To views  When you handle forms in views

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: You have to see two cases  First case  You have a basic form  Which you took from there  And passed it

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: So all the fields in the tea field  You have to pass it  And pass it on the view  Another case  When the user has submitted the form

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: What to do  First you detect  Post method, get method  Which method we have to work on  We handle all that

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: Once this work is done  We have to put queries  We have put a basic query  But you can fetch the data  We have passed it

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: This data passing  Has nothing to do with form  This is a basic variable  We have shown the loop  So in this section

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: We have not talked about form  Only this  One more thing  You can render the form in different ways  You can render it as a paragraph

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: Important thing is  You have to pass CSRF token  How does CSRF token look  Let's see  When you right click

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: And go to inspect  You will see  Form  Let's bring it to the side  And bring it

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: To the right side  You will see all your forms  You will see an input type  Hidden  This is a middleware token

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: It automatically injects middleware  And the more you see the form  The more you will see the change in the value  Every time when the form is reloaded  A unique value is generated

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: Which saves us from CSRF attack  That the form we submitted  Has come from our front end  And is going to our back end  This is a small injection

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: It is a good thing  We have a label, select, require field  HIRIT  This is an interesting talk  I think

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: This video has given you  Some knowledge enhancement  You will get the documentation  Forms are a bit complex  In Django

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: It is not that easy to handle  There are many courses for forms  But I think you have got enough knowledge  As we will do more projects  Subscribe for more videos

chunks.title: First look at Django forms
chunks.text: See you in the next video
